thread.title: Greenhouse For Sale

title: Greenhouse For Sale
text: 100 acres.One of the largest Mini Cuke Farms in North America. 12 acres of production is cutter connected. 5 acres in 92 tunnel houses with a total of 17 acres of growing area. Single phase hydro. 800 amp. Service. 60 kw generator. 3 New-Crone Boilers. Priva controls for water and fertilizer. 14,400 sq. ft. of warehouse. 4 Drilled Wells. Propagation area with lights. New 30 x 160 bunk house for 40 workers. 60 acres of outside production with irrigation, Land systematically tiled at 20 ft. Heating and electric oversized and will provide room to grow, the market is growing and there is not enough supply. All trucks and farm equipment. Full list of customers to be provided upon successfull purchase. Financial information available by signing Confidentiallity Agreements Asking Price $12,500,000.00 Call Toll Free 1-888-718-8445. Financials
